summary: HomePage hero layout was adjusted to place the supporting paragraph above the label and CTAs, but the supporting paragraph text was changed (extra sentence added) and the hero overlay/gradients were modified/augmented. Additional unrelated files were also modified, exceeding the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing copy in the supporting hero paragraph is changed (English text remains exactly as currently shown).
missing_requirements.reason: The supporting paragraph now includes an additional sentence after the specified opening line, indicating the copy was changed rather than moved as-is.

missing_requirements.requirement: The existing hero overlay/gradients remain in place and the paragraph remains readable over the background image in both light and dark themes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the overlay gradient classes were changed ('Enhanced Overlay Gradient') and an additional accent gradient wash layer was added, which alters the existing overlay/gradient setup rather than keeping it in place.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new/extra hero supporting copy text beyond the specified paragraph opening line (additional sentence).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states not to change the wording of the hero supporting paragraph; the diff shows added copy.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified and expanded hero background overlay/gradient styling (stronger contrast gradient + additional accent gradient wash).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request required existing overlay/gradients to remain in place; adding/changing gradient layers is beyond the requested move/reposition change.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified files outside the requested scope of the landing page hero layout (changes not limited to frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints asked to keep changes scoped to the landing page hero layout in HomePage.tsx, but the diff includes modifications to other files.
